comment:
Extracted Variables:
- Let x be the number of units of wine produced.
- Let y be the number of units of kombucha produced.

Extracted Constraints:
- 3x + 5y \leq 9000 (Fruit constraint)
- 8x + 7y \leq 7000 (Water constraint)
- x \geq y (Wine to Kombucha ratio constraint)
- y \geq 0.2x (Minimum kombucha production constraint)

Extracted Objective:
- Minimize 3x + 5y (Total units of fruit required)
